entries.info: index of the particle in REC::Particle
entries.name: pindex

entries.info: index of the track in its tracking bank
entries.name: index

entries.info: Layer ID as defined in org.jlab.detector.DetectorLayer
entries.name: layer

entries.info: x-position of the track at the detector surface (cm)
entries.name: x

entries.info: y-position of the track at the detector surface (cm)
entries.name: y

entries.info: z-position of the track at the detector surface (cm)
entries.name: z

entries.info: direction cosline of the track at the detector surface
entries.name: cx

entries.info: direction cosline of the track at the detector surface
entries.name: cy

entries.info: direction cosline of the track at the detector surface
entries.name: cz

entries.info: pathlength of the track to the detector surface from the DOCA point (cm)
entries.name: path
